channel.title: werkzeug on VIE
channel.description: Recent content in werkzeug on VIE

item.title: Bo1lersCTF 2021: Lorem_Ipsum
item.description: Lorem_Ipsum gave nothing but a simple homepage that allowed you to see “animal”-ified versions of the famous lorem ipsum placeholder text. Choose among the available animals, and notice a GET query parameter that looks something like ?animal=dogs. What if you gave it text garbage instead of an expected animal? This is a Werkzeug debugger! What fun, since Werkzeug in development mode will give you a python console with every traceback that is reported to you when something wrong happens.
